meta.title: Our Partners | Pledge & Grow
meta.description: Discover our strategic partnerships and collaborations that enable us to deliver exceptional digital solutions and services.

hero.title: Our Partnership Network
hero.description: We collaborate with a diverse range of partners across different categories to deliver exceptional value to our clients.

partnersList.title: Our Strategic Partners
partnersList.description: We collaborate with industry leaders and innovative companies to enhance our service offerings and deliver comprehensive solutions to our clients.
partnersList.heading: Our Partnership Network
partnersList.subheading: We collaborate with a diverse range of partners across different categories to deliver exceptional value to our clients.
partnersList.noPartnersFound: No partners found in this category.

partnerData.name: Acme Corporation
partnerData.description: Long-term client with preferred contract terms. We've been supporting their digital transformation journey for over 5 years.

partnerData.name: Global Enterprises
partnerData.description: Strategic client relationship with custom service agreements and dedicated support channels.

partnerData.name: Pepite France
partnerData.description: National network supporting student entrepreneurship across France. We collaborate on innovation programs and mentorship for young entrepreneurs.

partnerData.name: AWS
partnerData.description: Cloud infrastructure provider powering our scalable, reliable, and secure hosting solutions for enterprise clients.

partnerData.name: Vercel
partnerData.description: Frontend cloud platform enabling us to deliver fast, reliable web experiences with seamless deployment workflows.

partnerData.name: OVH
partnerData.description: European cloud provider we recommend for clients with specific data sovereignty requirements and regional hosting needs.

partnerData.name: Atlassian (JIRA)
partnerData.description: Project management and collaboration tools that power our development workflows and client communication processes.

partnerData.name: ERB BTP
partnerData.description: Premium construction partner offering special rates on building services for clients referred through our network.

partnerData.name: Global capital partner
partnerData.description: Exclusive consulting partner providing discounted business advisory services for our enterprise clients.

partnerData.name: Taskmate
partnerData.description: Premium task management solution provider offering special subscription plans for our clients.

partnerData.name: CordUnite
partnerData.description: Exclusive communications platform with preferential rates for businesses in our partner network.

partnerData.name: N&I Personal Shopper
partnerData.description: Luxury personal shopping service offering VIP packages for our enterprise clients and their executives.

partnerData.name: Dualink
partnerData.description: Dual-market expansion specialists providing discounted consulting services for our international clients.

partnerData.name: Chronos Corp.
partnerData.description: Time management and productivity solution provider with exclusive offers for our business network members.

partnerData.name: Sharka UGC
partnerData.description: Premium user-generated content platform providing AI-powered tools for content creation, moderation, and analytics for luxury brands.

becomePartner.heading: Become Our Partner
becomePartner.subheading: Join our partner ecosystem and collaborate on innovative solutions. We're always looking for strategic partnerships that create value for our clients.

strategic.title: Strategic Alliances
strategic.description: Form strategic partnerships to expand market reach and create innovative solutions together.

technology.title: Technology Partners
technology.description: Integrate your technology with our solutions to deliver enhanced value to our clients.

solution.title: Solution Partners
solution.description: Collaborate on comprehensive solutions that address complex business challenges.

channel.title: Channel Partners
channel.description: Resell or refer our solutions to your clients and earn competitive commissions.

marketAccess.title: Market Access
marketAccess.description: Reach new customers and markets through our established client base and marketing channels.

technicalCollaboration.title: Technical Collaboration
technicalCollaboration.description: Work with our expert team on joint solutions and innovative projects.

coMarketing.title: Co-Marketing Opportunities
coMarketing.description: Benefit from joint marketing initiatives, case studies, and promotional activities.

revenueGrowth.title: Revenue Growth
revenueGrowth.description: Create new revenue streams through referrals, reselling, and joint offerings.

application.title: Application
application.description: Submit your partnership application through our online form.

evaluation.title: Evaluation
evaluation.description: Our partnership team will review your application and assess alignment.

discussion.description: We'll schedule a meeting to discuss partnership opportunities and terms.
